svg.text: SCLCA Senior Facility & Mezzanine — Three-Layer Security Structure
Financial Holding Company — Borrower — Onward Lender
IC loan receivables (€15,879,884) — pledged to IIC
100% equity in subsidiaries (€99,000) — pledged to Creation Capital
DSRA at project level — compounding at 9% p.a.
• Atradius ECA cover (to be applied, M36 balance)
CoJ LOI + JW Approval + DWS letter
ECA cover sized to M36 exposed balance (~€4.2M)
PPAs: NWL IC + Smart City + open market + BESS
Atradius ECA cover — to be applied
Full IC loan €2,048,149 — vanilla, from M24
CoE rental + timber panel pipeline R177.9M
Senior loan to SCLCA secured by all three layers — IC receivables, guarantees & insurance, physical assets & revenue contracts
SCLCA pledges IC loan receivables (€15,879,884) to IIC and 100% subsidiary equity (€99,000) to Creation Capital
NWL: Veracity + Atradius ECA + DSRA/FEC or Swap + DTIC + GEPF | LanRED: Underwriting or Swap (bank-to-bank) | TWX: Phoenix + Atradius
Physical assets (MABR, BoP, civil works, solar PV, BESS, CoE building, panel equipment) + revenue contracts (LOIs, PPAs, timber pipeline R177.9M)
Lanseria area water demand of 50 MLD vs 2 MLD installed capacity — 25x growth headroom underpins long-term revenue security
"or" items subject to debt sculpting / scenario toggles. Atradius ECA applications pending. LanRED: independent underwriting or bank-to-bank swap per asset choices.
